thread.title: You Know You're NOT From Colorado When: Reader's Picks
thread.title_full: You Know You're NOT From Colorado When: Reader's Picks | Westword

author: Michael Roberts
title: You Know You're NOT From Colorado When: Reader's Picks
text:
Additional photos and more below. ShopExile via Etsy When we recently re-shared our vintage post featuring our favorite "You Know You're NOT from Colorado When" punchlines , we asked readers for their favorite way to complete that thought.
And as usual, you came through.
We photo-illustrated our ten favorite answers, which touch on traffic, wardrobe mistakes, overcrowding and more.
Count them down below.
Number 10: You know you're NOT from Colorado when....
YouTube ...You use ski poles to do a three-mile hike in Evergreen.
Number 9: You know you're NOT from Colorado when....
YouTube ...you use the left lane only to pass.
Number 8: You know you're NOT from Colorado when....
Related Stories Photos: Top ten "You know you're NOT from Colorado when" punchlines YouTube ...you're confused by green crosses.
Number 7: You know you're NOT from Colorado when....
EXPAND YouTube ...you wear a jacket in weather that's over fifty degrees.
Number 6: You know you're NOT from Colorado when....
YouTube ...you don't call Coca-Cola "soda pop."
Number 5: You know you're NOT from Colorado when....
YouTube ...you bring lunch on a hike "just in case."
Number 4: You know you're NOT from Colorado when....
YouTube ...you think your clever for carrying your skis in your pole straps, when in reality it just says "I'm from Texas."
Number 3: You know you're NOT from Colorado when....
YouTube ...you don't know anyone who works at a dispensary.
Number 2: You know you're NOT from Colorado when....
EXPAND Thinkstock ...you're trying too hard.
rency="true">
